detaileddescription.para: Title: P04006: Relative abundance of tarakihi in TAR1
Status: Completed Trophia was contracted by the New Zealand Ministry of Fisheries (MFish) to monitor the abundance of TAR 1 using Catch and Effort data. The specific objective for this project :

listitem.para: To update the standardised CPUE indices for TAR 1 using data up to the end of 2003/2004.

detaileddescription.para: This project was funded by MFish project TAR2004-02
Output includes presentation of results to the Ministry of Fisheries Inshore Stock Assessment Working Group meetings, and a Final Research Report, available from this site
Kendrick, T.H. (2006). Updated catch-per-unit-effort indices for three substocks of tarakihi in TAR 1, 1989–90 to 2003–04. New Zealand Fisheries Assessment Report 2006/14. 64 p.
